description: Brock O’Hurn, dubbed Hottest Guy on Instagram by BuzzFeed, will appear in a new Tyler Perry fi...
title: Instagram hottie Brock O’Hurn and Tyler Perry team up for new movie
title_page: Instagram hottie Brock O’Hurn and Tyler Perry team up for new movie
text:
Brock O’Hurn, dubbed Hottest Guy on Instagram by BuzzFeed, will appear in a new Tyler Perry film. He announced the news - where else? - via Instagram.
Tyler Perry posts buff bod beach photos
Tyler Perry's $25 million estate still on the market
Tyler Perry and his newest leading man, Instagram hottie Brock O'Hurn (center).
Tyler Perry, Usher in Washington for Kennedy Center honors
Tyler Perry meets a special group of children grateful for his help
O'Hurn will play a character named "Horse" in the upcoming "Boo! A Madea Halloween." The site imdb.com lists a few past credits - “The Experience,” “Amphibious” and “Laguna Rising” - although they are all listed as "in development."
The towering hunk is mostly known for standing around looking huge and hot. Notes BuzzFeed in a piece titled "The Super Charmed Life of Instagram's Hottest Guy": "Brock O’Hurn is ... 6’7”, 250 pounds, tan, muscular, blue-eyed, with a light-brown, tousled mane that, when not grazing his often shirtless chest, sits in a perfectly messy topknot."
But he struck a humble chord in his Instagram post announcing the Tyler Perry movie:
